SOCIAL_PLATFORM_YOUTUBE: 🤖🥛 A Study of Light automates the “Magic Milk” experiment, to bring you high quality, high volume abstract art. The system places food dye in a bowl of milk. When emulsifier (dish soap) is added, it changes the surface tension and interacts with the fats in the milk, causing incredible patterns to emerge.
